meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Linda Hilton Frank Epstein Sharon Goldstein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1718.

div.div:
Frank Epstein game 1.
3 clues missing in Double Jeopardy.

td.p: Linda Hilton, an author from Arizona
Frank Epstein, a police officer from Los Angeles, California
Sharon Goldstein, a writer from Hollywood, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,000)

tr.td: "HOT"
SUMMER
KNIGHTS
TV SPIN-OFFS
SCIENCE & NATURE
RECIPES
